title: An Early Evaluation of GPT-4V(ision). (arXiv:2310.16534v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: In this paper, we evaluate different abilities of GPT-4V including visual understanding, language understanding, visual puzzle solving, and understanding of other modalities such as depth, thermal, video, and audio. To estimate GPT-4V's performance, we manually construct 656 test instances and carefully evaluate the results of GPT-4V. Abstract: In this paper, we evaluate different abilities of GPT-4V including visual understanding, language understanding, visual puzzle solving, and understanding of other modalities such as depth, thermal, video, and audio. translated_abstract: 本文评估了GPT-4V的多个能力，包括视觉理解、语言理解、视觉拼图解决以及对深度、热量、视频和音频等其他模态的理解。为了评估GPT-4V的表现，我们手动构建了656个测试实例，并对GPT-4V的结果进行了仔细评估。我们的研究发现如下亮点：(1) GPT-4V在英语视觉为中心的基准测试中表现出色，但在图像中无法识别简单的中文文本；(2) 当回答与性别、种族和年龄等敏感特征相关的问题时，GPT-4V表现出不一致的拒绝行为；(3) GPT-4V在语言理解任务上的表现比GPT-4 (API)差，包括一般的语言理解基准测试和视觉常识知识评估基准测试；(4) 少样本启示法可以提高GPT-4V在视觉理解和语言理解上的表现；(5) GPT-4V在寻找细微差别上存在困难。
tldr: GPT-4V在英文视觉为中心的基准测试上表现出色，但在识别中文文本、处理敏感特征相关问题和语言理解任务上存在挑战。
en_tdlr: GPT-4V performs well on English visual-centric benchmarks, but faces challenges in recognizing Chinese text, handling sensitive trait-related questions, and language understanding tasks.
